thread.title: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Arizona Launches Get In!
thread.title_full: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Arizona Launches Get In! - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Arizona Launches Get In!
text:
Blue Cross Blue Shield of Arizona
Free online educational resource helps Arizonans get informed and involved in selecting health plans
PHOENIX , Oct. 1, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- Do you know what deductible, network or formulary means? If not, then you may pick the wrong health plan for you and your family. So that doesn't happen, Blue Cross Blue Shield of Arizona (BCBSAZ) today announced Get In!, a free online resource to help when buying insurance. It aims to make health insurance easier to understand so Arizonans Get Informed. Get Involved. Get Insured.
Through storytelling, videos and infographics, Get In! is designed to make consumers think differently about health coverage. By illustrating how insurance applies to everyday situations, terms and concepts are more intuitive.
The site – AZBlue.com/GetIn – offers tips, checklists, frequently asked questions and more. Get In! provides everything Arizonans need to review and understand their health plan choices.
The ultimate goal of Get In! is to help consumers feel comfortable with how health insurance works, so they can ask the right questions and ultimately pick the right plan.
"Choosing the right health plan is critically important, so we are doing everything we can to simplify the process and make sure Arizonans understand their choices," said Jeff Stelnik , senior vice president of BCBSAZ. " Get In! helps Arizonans learn the ins and outs of health plan options so they can make the right decision for themselves and their families."
To learn more about Get In! tools and resources, please visit AZBlue.com/GetIn.
About Blue Cross Blue Shield of Arizona
Blue Cross Blue Shield of Arizona (BCBSAZ), an independent licensee of the Blue Cross and Blue Shield Association , is the largest Arizona -based health insurance company. The not-for-profit company was founded in 1939 and provides health insurance products, services or networks to 1.3 million individuals. With offices in Phoenix , Flagstaff , Tucson and the East Valley, the company employs more than 1,300 Arizonans. Follow BCBSAZ at www.facebook.com/bcbsaz or on Twitter at @bcbsaz to get information on health and wellness as well as a knowledgeable perspective on health insurance reform, and to become a part of what we're doing in your community.
